  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CaesarCipher(int key)
    Constructs a CaesarCipher object that encrypts by shifting a letter 'key' positions further right in ALPHABET (with wrap-around).
    CaesarCipher(String key)
    Constructs a CaesarCipher object, where the shift is given by taking the key's first letter, then finding the location of this letter in ALPHABET.

  • Constructor Details

    • CaesarCipher

      public CaesarCipher(int key)
      Constructs a CaesarCipher object that encrypts by shifting a letter 'key' positions further right in ALPHABET (with wrap-around). 'key' could be negative, in which case the shift is leftward. A key of 0 is also allowed, but results in the null cipher.
      Parameters:
      key - how far to shift each letter.

    • CaesarCipher

      public CaesarCipher(String key)
      Constructs a CaesarCipher object, where the shift is given by taking the key's first letter, then finding the location of this letter in ALPHABET.
      Parameters:
      key - the string whose first letter determines the shift.

  • Method Details

    • prep

      public String prep(String cleartext)
      Prepare cleartext for encrypting. At minimum this requires removing spaces, punctuation, and non-alphabetic characters, then uppercasing what's left.
      Specified by:
      prep in class CharacterCipher
      Parameters:
      cleartext -
      Returns:
      a version of the cleartext ready for encrypting.

    • encrypt

      public String encrypt(String preptext)
      Encrypt a string that's been prepared for encryption.
      Specified by:
      encrypt in class CharacterCipher
      Parameters:
      preptext - a version of a cleartext string, prepared for encryption.
      Returns:
      the encryption of the preptext.

    • decrypt

      public String decrypt(String ciphertext)
      Decrypts an encrypted string. The decrypted text should match the preptext that was encrypted.
      Specified by:
      decrypt in class CharacterCipher
      Parameters:
      ciphertext - the encrypted string to decrypt.
      Returns:
      the decryption of the ciphertext.
